_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 17:20:13 using v2.1
title: Did people feel they were listened to carefully?
analysis_commentary: The majority of people (over 78% in all years) reported feeling they were definitely listened to carefully – a figure that has been consistent over the past 4 years. The proportion of those who didn’t feel they were listened to carefully has increased from 3% in 2010 to 4% in 2013, however, this increase was not significant.
